This is the patch from steam. Instruction are inside the RAR file. enjoy

General performance increase around 20%

* This will vary depending on both the computer specifications and game settings.


Fixes

* 3rd Party controller scrolling issue has been fixed.
* Corrected various crashes reported across all versions.

* Corrected a crash in ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œStreakingÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ Diversion for Spanish version.


Removals

* Original frame cap of 32 FPS has been removed.


Additions

* New variable frame cap has been implemented. This will smooth out spikes in overall framerate.

Note: Players may notice a small hitch when crossing into new chunks in the world.
The amount of time for this has been reduced for recommended spec machines, 
but may still be noticeable, particularly while driving at high speeds.
